summary: In Paris, a cat who lives a secret life as a cat burglar's aide must come to the rescue of Zoe, the little girl he lives with, after she falls into a gangster's clutches.
cast: Dominique Blanc|Bernadette Lafont|Bruno Salomone|Jean Benguigui|Oriane Zani|Bernard Bouillon|Jacques Ramade|Jean-Pierre Yvars|Patrick Ridremont|Patrick Descamps|Yves Barbaut|Line Wiblé|JB Blanc|Steve Blum|Marcia Gay Harden|Anjelica Huston|Matthew Modine|Lauren Weintraub|Mike Pollock|Philippe Hartmann|Gregory Cupoli|Marc Thompson|Eric Bauza|Barbara Goodson|Kristen Rutherford
title: Un gato en París
